categories.title: Rent
categories.comment: We lived in our second investment apartment.

categories.title: Mortgage
categories.comment: Debt-free for two years. Including mortgage.

categories.title: Utilities
categories.comment: Utilities for a one-bedroom apartment for a year.

categories.title: Tax
categories.comment: Residence tax for the previous year.

categories.title: Repairs
categories.comment: All repairs were considered as an investment in assets.

categories.title: Groceries
categories.comment: Wow! Almost twice on groceries in 2020. Three reasons. First, our family has grown. Second, we started to buy more healthy and organic food. Third, inflation on groceries in Russia was much more than the official 4.9%.

categories.title: Eating out
categories.comment: It was hard to go to the restaurant with a small baby, and, yeah, pandemic.

categories.title: Alcohol
categories.comment: I quit alcohol entirely in March. No benefits and a lot of downsides. If you're interested, read This Naked Mind by Annie Grace.

categories.title: Gas
categories.comment: We've sold our car in September. Gas till this time.

categories.title: Maintenance
categories.comment: Oil change and new tires.

categories.title: Car Tax
categories.comment: Tax for the previous year.

categories.title: Insurance
categories.comment: Insurance for me. Missis hadn't time to drive.

categories.title: Parking
categories.comment: I prefer public transportation when going to paid parking zones.

categories.title: Public transport
categories.comment: Train tickets to visit family. All my work was remote.

categories.title: Car rent
categories.comment: We started using a car-sharing service in Moscow instead of our car.

categories.title: Taxi
categories.comment: Another fleet of cars when we really need them.

categories.title: Health Insurance
categories.comment: All private doctor visits were paid from our own pockets.

categories.title: Doctor visits
categories.comment: Minor issues and regular check-ups for the baby. Missis's rehabilitation after pregnancy. My issues with new food plan.

categories.title: Pharmacy
categories.comment: This includes vitamins, which we bought in bulk.

categories.title: Entertainment
categories.comment: The main sources of entertainment in 2020 were books.

categories.title: Education
categories.comment: Almost no paid education, only self-driven learning from books and free resources.

categories.title: Sport
categories.comment: Set of dumbbells for the Happy Body Programm.

categories.title: Hobbies and arts
categories.comment: Nastya's oils for her new perfume hobby.

categories.title: Clothing
categories.comment: Our friends and family provided us with clothes for the baby. We only needed to buy a few things. Thanks, all!

categories.title: Tech & Gadgets
categories.comment: Two pairs of Apple Watch and AirPods. New iPhone Xr for Missis. And nice noise-canceling Sony headphones for productive work. All tech we bought new because it was a tricky business to find really good deals on those ones.

categories.title: Home stuff
categories.comment: Kitchen stuff.

categories.title: Work supplies
categories.comment: Apple keyboard and trackpad for the proper back position for full-time work.

categories.title: Household goods
categories.comment: Little kid is a big pile of laundry.

categories.title: Cell phone
categories.comment: Same plan as in 2019.

categories.title: Subscriptions
categories.comment: Spotify, Yazio.

categories.title: Personal
categories.comment: Leo's diapers and beauty products for Nastya.

categories.title: Misc
categories.comment: Stroller, child car seats, etc.

categories.title: Hotels
categories.comment: Trip to the Ural Mountains in winter and Abkhazia in summer.

categories.title: Travel Transportation
categories.comment: Gas for the first trip and airplane tickets for the second.

categories.title: Travel Entertainment
categories.comment: Ski-pass for two weeks.

categories.title: Food and other
categories.comment: Food for the second trip. Mainly cooked at the apartment.

categories.title: Presents
categories.comment: Birthday and holiday presents.

categories.title: Parties hosting
categories.comment: Nastya's and Leo's birthday parties.

categories.title: Charity
categories.comment: Donations to volunteer organization in recycling business and some charity.

categories.title: Taxes and fees
categories.comment: Self-employment tax.

categories.title: Fines
categories.comment: Wow! Almost no fines.

categories.title: Investments
categories.comment: Income from our investment property could've been higher this year. But for the first two months of the lockdown, the apartment was unoccupied.

categories.title: Paycheck
categories.comment: I joined my previous team to help build products for small businesses.

categories.title: Side hustle
categories.comment: I did more part-time design work than the previous year.

categories.title: Interest
categories.comment: Cashback and interest on bank accounts.

categories.title: Stuff sales
categories.comment: Less stuff to sell as you became minimalist.

categories.title: Presents
categories.comment: This is very generous of you, friends and family!

categories.title: Other
categories.comment: Child benefit and government aid for families.
